title: How to Make a Singapore Sling

steps.headline: Add the lime juice to a mixing glass.
Add a dash of Angostura bitters.
Add the cherry brandy next and the cointreau or triple sec.
Fill the mixing glass with ice cubes.
Shake.
steps.description: Put the top half of the cocktail shaker on. Slap it down firmly to seal. Hold the top and bottom, and shake vigorously over your shoulder for about 20 seconds. When you see condensation on the outside of the shaker and it feels very cold, the Singapore Sling is mixed.

steps.headline: Tap the side of the shaker to loosen the two halves.
steps.description: You may need to rock the glass back and forth to release it.

steps.headline: Strain.
steps.description: Place the strainer over the shaker and strain into the long glass.

steps.headline: Top up the drink with crushed ice.
Drizzle with the grenadine so that it oozes down the edges of the drink.
Garnish.
steps.description: Add two straws, a slice of pineapple, and a glace (glazed) cherry. It is now ready to serve.

steps.headline: Shake all ingredients except the club soda (it'll explode) with ice.
Garnish with orange slice and mint sprig.

text: Version One Add the lime juice to a mixing glass.  Add the pineapple juice.  Add a dash of Angostura bitters.  Pour in the benedictine.  Add the cherry brandy next and the cointreau or triple sec.  Add the gin.  Fill the mixing glass with ice cubes.  Shake. Put the top half of the cocktail shaker on. Slap it down firmly to seal. Hold the top and bottom, and shake vigorously over your shoulder for about 20 seconds. When you see condensation on the outside of the shaker and it feels very cold, the Singapore Sling is mixed. Tap the side of the shaker to loosen the two halves. You may need to rock the glass back and forth to release it. Strain. Place the strainer over the shaker and strain into the long glass. Top up the drink with crushed ice.  Drizzle with the grenadine so that it oozes down the edges of the drink.  Garnish. Add two straws, a slice of pineapple, and a glace (glazed) cherry. It is now ready to serve. Finished.  Version Two: Raffle's Singapore Sling Shake all ingredients except the club soda (it'll explode) with ice.  Strain into a tall glass.  Add ice cubes to fill.  Garnish with orange slice and mint sprig.
